parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: IPArrayAttribute
parameters.description: The attribute of the IP whitelist group.

parameters.name: IPArrayName
parameters.description: The name of the IP whitelist group.

parameters.name: SecurityIPList
parameters.description: The IP addresses in the IP whitelist group. A maximum of 1,000 IP addresses or CIDR blocks are allowed.
